alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:19PM CDT until March 31 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bolivar County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1018 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Trusten Holder WMA, or 11 miles north of Rosedale, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Deeson around 1035 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Duncan and Alligator. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
